songs.title: Carried By Six
songs.lyrics:
I’m no gumbo
I’m just gung ho
My momma thinks I’m crazy
I always try to tell her
That’s the way the Lord made me
Relying on the prayers
Thinking only Christ can save me
But I’m gonna set it off
Before I let a nigga plays me

The  city streets raised me
And my district they be trippin
When they think they caught me slipping
I be spitting with the smithin
A sparking with the larkin
A stretcher with the heckler
I’m strictly head hunting
So at best it won’t protect you
But now you own my life
So my gun is my investor
Feed  them hollow points
Cause it’s best to apply pressure
Give you 11 and serve your homies
The extra
22 lense at your foot
Clyde Drexler
Homicidal bullets
Like vital
Tell em to betcha
Squirt that
Dirt nap
Eternal siesta
But if you get away
You better not let me catch you
But I was taught by OGs like
Gerald Hester


Refrain:
Homie hold me down
So I risked a murder case
Fools get out of line
Now I hope he ditched the murder race
I’d rather be judged by 12
Than carried by six
I’d rather be judged by 12
Than carried by six



I recently got threatened
By this  nigga that I know
He used to be my homie
But that nigga gotta go
Lil little homie is a fan
So I sent him to a show
When he come out on the stage
Mace him from the front row
All my bones talking greasy
It was a stunt though
Cause when that barrel’s in your face
I’m gonna make it blunt though

One pump from the shottie
It will leave your body resting
I’m hard line pressing
Just ask the niggas from my section
Best stay in your place
And be careful who you threaten
I’ll come shoot up your set
Have you looking like a western
Caught dead banging
And still won’t give no confession
Invoke my right
To remain silent
Just a lesson

Niggas think I”m worried though
But I ain’t even stressing
Keep a blank stare
Just to keep you niggas guessing
You gonna do what?
What gives you that impression?
I lost one but guess what?
I got another weapon

Homie hold me down
So I risked a murder case
Fools get out of line
Now I hope he ditched the murder race
I’d rather be judged by 12
Than carried by six
I’d rather be judged by 12
Than carried by six

Homie hold me down
So I risked a murder case
Fools get out of line
Now I hope he ditched the murder race
I’d rather be judged by 12
Than carried by six
I’d rather be judged by 12
Than carried by six

He didn’t learn in school
So I guess I gotta teach him
Slug to his mug
That’s the only way to reach him


Black talent hollows
Black talents I keep ‘em
He want to act an animal
So that’s the way I treat him

Guns on my girlfriends
They like the way I squeeze ‘em
Go and catch another body
That’s the only way to please ‘em

Got me under oath
But never commit treason
For me to put you down
Really don’t need a reason

Deliiberately persistent
I’ll hunt ya then punch ya
Show you  the man
Unless you wanna  see the monster
Grim reaper snatch ya
You’re caught up in the rapture
So drip up when you’re no longer here after
And that’s what you get
For fucking with a master
Left  you all in pieces
Gotta scoop ya with a spatula

Repetetive  gunfire
Rapidly coming at ya
Coming  my way
Guess what
You’re headed for disaster


Refrain
Homie hold me down
So I risked a murder case
Fools get out of line
Now I hope he ditched the murder race
I’d rather be judged by 12
Than carried by six
I’d rather be judged by 12
Than carried by six


Homie hold me down
So I risked a murder case
Fools get out of line
Now I hope he ditched the murder race
I’d rather be judged by 12
Than carried by six
I’d rather be judged by 12
Than carried by six
